A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Misses the mark and fails to create new magic for the series\, with shallow storytelling and symbolism\, the public opinions are divided between new and old fans\, the new fans to the series cannot understand why this isn't a good movie\, and the old cannot comprehend why this is accepted as star wars. One thing is certain\, the people here at rotten tomatoes must have been bribed \nsignificantly to give it a 92% ratio.
